Description: Omphalos of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior streakily glazed (fired reddish); rosette in added red and white on top of omphalos; red and white bands around rosette and on bowl; exterior: omphalos reserved; on wall, broken maeander band between bands of single dots and lines; band at edge of omphalos; graffito inscription on exterior within omphalos.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 306, possibly no. 1213) (Number not precised)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1993) (phase 2)
